com.googlecode.cqengine.index.support

Class CloseableQueryResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.index.support.CloseableQueryResources

  • public class CloseableQueryResources
extends Object
    A QueryOption that allows to keep track of query resources that need to be closed.
    The engine will then make sure that, when the outer result-set close method is called, all the resources are closed.
    Author:
    Silvano Riz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a new resource that needs to be closed.

      static CloseableQueryResources from(QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Method that returns the existing CloseableQueryResources in the QueryOptions or a new instance.
      The method takes care of adding the new instance to the passed QueryOptions.
